contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|soar|soaring}} '''Soaring''' may refer to: * [[Gliding]], in which pilots fly unpowered aircraft known as gliders or sailplanes * [[Lift (soaring)]], a meteorological phenomenon used as an energy source by some aircraft and birds * An increased speed of growth in a mountains height * [[Soaring (magazine)|''Soaring'' (magazine)]], a magazine produced by the Soaring Society of America * ''[[SOARING]]'', a public artwork at [[Alverno College]] * [[List of soaring birds]] * [[Soarin' Over California]], a ride at [[Disney California Adventure Park]] in Anaheim, California * [[Soarin']], a ride in Walt Disney World's [[Epcot]] which is the same as Soarin' Over California ==See also== *[[Bird flight]] *[[Flying and gliding animals]] *[[Dynamic soaring]] *[[Ridge soaring]] * [[Controllable slope soaring]] * [[Orographic lift]] * [[Thermal]]s * [[Lee waves]] {{disambig}}
